title: Guthixian icon

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Guthixian icon is an item purchased from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 500 Last Man Standing points. It can be brought to Juna in the Chasm of Tears along with a staff of the dead to create a staff of balance. This process is irreversible.

content:
Not to be confused with Guthix icon.
Guthixian icon

The Guthixian icon is an item purchased from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 500 Last Man Standing points. It can be brought to Juna in the Chasm of Tears along with a staff of the dead to create a staff of balance. This process is irreversible.

When the icon is investigated, the chatbox message states The icon honours Guthix with a depiction of the god's loyal servant, Juna, whom you met deep below Lumbridge. Perhaps she can do something with it.

[[File:Guthixian icon detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Guthixian icon''' is an item purchased from [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 500 [[Last Man Standing]] points. It can be brought to [[Juna]] in the [[Chasm of Tears]] along with a [[staff of the dead]] to create a [[staff of balance]]. This process is '''irreversible'''.

When the icon is investigated, the chatbox message states ''The icon honours Guthix with a depiction of the god's loyal servant, Juna, whom you met deep below Lumbridge. Perhaps she can do something with it.''
